segments.text: I notice the little girl standing by, her eyes bright with anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like she can already taste the cookies, her excitement is palpable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of nostalgia; it reminds me of moments spent like this in my own childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I see the boy wobbling on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races as I think he might fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, the scene feels delightfully mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I canâ€™t help but smile watching these kids plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR
